channel.title: PvP System ERROR!
channel.description: Okay so i followed Adolf Hitlers Guide on RS and i did EVERYTHING 100 % CORRECT. But when i compile i get these errors: [code]src\server\model\players\Player.java:637: error: illegal start of expression public boolean inPvP() ^ src\server\model\players\Player.java:637: error: ';' expected public boolean inPvP() ^ src\server\model\players\Player.java:641: error: illegal start of expression public boolean inSafeZone() ^ src\server\model\players\Player.java:641: error: ';' expected public boolean inSafeZone() ^ 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: PvP System ERROR!
item.dc:creator: @Morgan_Linder Morgan Linder
item.description:
@Morgan_Linder wrote:

[code]src\server\model\players\Client.java:24: error: cannot find symbol
import server.model.players.pvp.PvPHandler;
^
symbol: class PvPHandler
location: package server.model.players.pvp
src\server\model\players\Client.java:45: error: cannot find symbol
private PvPHandler pvpHandler = new PvPHandler(this);
^
symbol: class PvPHandler
location: class Client
src\server\model\players\Client.java:45: error: cannot find symbol
private PvPHandler pvpHandler = new PvPHandler(this);
^
symbol: class PvPHandler
location: class Client
src\server\model\players\pvp\EarningPotential.java:42: error: cannot find symbol

                            c.earningPotential -= 10;
                             ^

symbol: variable earningPotential
location: variable c of type Client
src\server\model\players\pvp\EarningPotential.java:43: error: cannot find symbol

                            if (c.earningPotential < 0)
                                 ^

symbol: variable earningPotential
location: variable c of type Client
src\server\model\players\pvp\EarningPotential.java:44: error: cannot find symbol

                                    c.earningPotential = 0;
                                     ^

symbol: variable earningPotential
location: variable c of type Client
src\server\model\players\pvp\EarningPotential.java:49: error: cannot find symbol

            if (c.earningPotential >= 50) {
                 ^

symbol: variable earningPotential
location: variable c of type Client
src\server\model\players\pvp\EarningPotential.java:50: error: cannot find symbol

                    if (c.inWild() && c2.inWild() && c.getPA().getWearingAmo

unt() > 4 && c2.getPA().getWearingAmount() > 4 && c.getItems().getCarriedWealth(
) > 500000 && c2.getItems().getCarriedWealth() > 500000) {

                                                          ^

symbol: method getCarriedWealth()
location: class ItemAssistant
src\server\model\players\pvp\EarningPotential.java:50: error: cannot find symbol

                    if (c.inWild() && c2.inWild() && c.getPA().getWearingAmo

unt() > 4 && c2.getPA().getWearingAmount() > 4 && c.getItems().getCarriedWealth(
) > 500000 && c2.getItems().getCarriedWealth() > 500000) {

                       ^

symbol: method getCarriedWealth()
location: class ItemAssistant
src\server\model\players\pvp\EarningPotential.java:51: error: cannot find symbol

                            c.earningPotential -= 50;
                             ^

symbol: variable earningPotential
location: variable c of type Client

10 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
